description: 1 x Acacia - front grounds - Thin throughout the crown by 20%; Remove the first 4 branches which overhang the garden and driveway Remove all major deadwood from the crown 1 x Large Cherry - front grounds - cavity at 3m from ground level on the north (tension) side - Reduce the crown height by 3-4m; Reduce the crown spread to balance and shape (approx. 2-2.5m)1 x Cherry - front grounds - growing into the telephone pole and wires - Reduce the height by 3-3.5m; Reduce the spread on the east side by 2-2.5m 1 x Elderberry - front grounds - growing into the street light - Reduce the spread on the east side to clear the street light (approx. 1.5-2m)1 x Very large Fig - rear grounds - growing against the boundary fence - Reduce the height by 3-4m; Reduce the crown spread mainly on the south, west and north sides by 33% (approx. 4m)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
